attributes.action: Initiate a 'Battle Royale' program for high school students in order to enforce discipline.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every year, fifty year 10 classes should be selected randomly. Each class should be sent to a designated area in which they will have to fight to the death until one remains. The survivor from each class should be then given a high-ranking job in the military. For more details, read the novel 'Battle Royale' by Koushun Takami.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
